subject: Talking animals!
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I have gotten our dead dogs on EVP, or through the box, but today, as 
my wife an I were both downstairs, we didn't hear the doorbell  as the 
neighbor kid was ringing it, so being about 7, he just came on in.  The 
smallest Yorkie let out a loud bark, and I swear it said "get outta 
here". I heard it as plan as any other speech.  

 I know, anecdotal evidence. 

 Frank-S
